akn:section.akn:heading: Release or modification of restrictions on management, investment, or purpose.

akn:content.akn:p: If the donor consents in a record, an institution may release or modify, in whole or in part, a restriction contained in a gift instrument on the management, investment, or purpose of an institutional fund. A release or modification may not allow a fund to be used for a purpose other than a charitable purpose of the institution.
